roadmapItems.title: New Year's Day
roadmapItems.description: Celebrate the start of the new year with this public holiday.

roadmapItems.title: Australia Day
roadmapItems.description: Celebrate the national day of Australia with this public holiday.

roadmapItems.title: Good Friday
roadmapItems.description: Observance of Good Friday, a Christian holiday marking the crucifixion of Jesus.

roadmapItems.title: Easter Monday
roadmapItems.description: Public holiday following Easter Sunday, commemorating the resurrection of Jesus.

roadmapItems.title: Anzac Day
roadmapItems.description: Commemoration of Australian and New Zealand Army Corps who served and died in wars.

roadmapItems.title: Queen's Birthday
roadmapItems.description: Celebration of the birthday of the reigning monarch of Australia.

roadmapItems.title: Christmas Day
roadmapItems.description: Celebration of the birth of Jesus, a significant cultural and religious holiday.

roadmapItems.title: Boxing Day
roadmapItems.description: Traditional post-Christmas holiday with various cultural and sporting events.
